redstonemagic.oom: Not Enough Mana to Cast Spell...

advancements.rmroot.title: An Ancient Power Revealed
advancements.armors.description: Tivruski teaches you that you can craft leather and netherite redstone armor.  They can be dyed, increase maximum mana and mana regeneration, can self-mend when enchantment glow is on, and have suit bonus.
advancements.armors.netherite.descriptio: You learn Redstone Enhanced Netherite Armor is fireproof, speeds mana regeneration more, and regenerates up to 20 percent of mana.  A full suit provides Ruby Shield 1.  It can be repaired with netherite.
advancements.armors.leather.description: You learn Redstone Enhanced Leather Armor is durable, gives some knockback resistance, speeds mana regeneration some, and regenerates mana up to 6 percent. A full suit provides Absorption 1 every five minutes.  It can be repaired with leather.
advancements.devices.description: The Wizard Shirayuki, teaches you that you can craft a Redstone Block to make Redstone Magic Devices.  See the Redstone Magic Advancement Tab for more details.
advancements.devices.gatherer.descriptio: Shirayuki says that a Gatherer infuses the area around it with redstone mana.  Areas with a lot of redstone magic sparkle with power.
advancements.devices.ritualpylon.descrip: Shirayuki says using a tool, torch, or lantern on the Ritual Pylon will summon a Red Spirit to use the tool.  Put a chest under the Ritual Pylon to collect results.
advancements.devices.ritualpylon.nethers: Perhaps using a powerful item like a NetherStar on a ritual pylon would do something?  It seems dangerous.
advancements.falderals.description: Tivruski teaches you how to modify Redstone Spells with 'Falderals' in your hotbar. 'Falderal' are not consumed.  New secrets revealed on the Redstone Magic Advancements Tab.
advancements.falderal.blueice.descriptio: Blue Ice changes a Redstone Bolt to an Ice Bolt.  Blazes fear it.
advancements.falderal.dragonegg.descript: Tho very powerful- No Use has been rediscovered yet.
advancements.falderal.feather.descriptio: A Feather makes Ancient Blessings cast Slow Falling.
advancements.falderal.fermentedspidereye: A Fermented Spider Eye Makes Ancient Blessings cast Invisibility.
advancements.falderal.firecharge.descrip: The Wizard Grell teaches you, A Fire Charge changes a Redstone Bolt into a Fire Bolt.
advancements.falderal.ghasttear.descript: The Wizard Vermillion teaches you, A Ghast Tear allows you to fly while casting a Redstone Bolt.  You practice strafing birds.
advancements.falderal.turtle_helmet.desc: Grell teaches you, A Turtle Helmet strengthens the Crimson Cloud slow damage snaring spell.
advancements.falderal.glowstonedust.desc: You discover that a Glowstone Dust changes Scarlet Heal cast light when it has no target to heal.
advancements.falderal.goldencarrot.descr: Perhaps a Golden Carrot would make Ancient Blessings cast a longer lasting Night Vision, even when it's not dark.
advancements.falderal.magmacream.descrip: You discover a Magma Cream makes Ancient Blessings cast a longer lasting Fire Resistance, even when you are not on fire.
advancements.falderal.milkbucket.descrip: Tivruski teaches you a full bucket of milk is required to cast Cleanse to remove bad effects and that Cleanse can always be Quick Cast.
advancements.falderal.netherstar.descrip: Tivruski teaches you that Netherstar increases the duration of all Ancient Blessings.  New secrets revealed on the Redstone Magic Advancements Tab.
advancements.falderal.pufferfish.descrip: You wonder if a Puffer Fish or Trident might make Ancient Blessings cast a longer lasting Water Breathing.  Even when you are not under water.
advancements.falderal.spidereye.descript: The Wizard Grell teaches you, a Spider Eye adds damage to the Sepsis slow damage spell.
advancements.items.description: Tivruski says you must craft a Redstone Focus (which he calls a 'Redfish') to learn more.  The Redfish will provide you spells, a small mana pool and some mana regeneration.
advancements.items.redstonefocus.descrip: The Redfish lets you use redstone mana to cast spells.  It's a powerful shield but you can use extra Redfish can be used from the hotbar.  Cast spells by holding the right mouse button down until the spell casting bar stops growing wider.
advancements.items.bed.description: When you sleep, you regenerate a little mana.  And sleep can slowly take you to full mana.
advancements.preparingspells.description: Tivruski teaches you how to prepare spells by Sneaking And Right Clicking the Redfish.  You can go backwards or forwards thru your spell list by looking up or down when preparing a new spell.
advancements.quickcastingspells.descript: Tivruski teaches you how to Quick Cast a spell for less mana and weaker effect by releasing before the spell casting bar is full.  Some spells, like Light and Remove curse, still give full effect when quick cast.
advancements.reagents.description: Tivruski teaches you: Reagents must be in the hotbar and are destroyed to make spells more powerful.
advancements.reagent.redstone.descriptio: Tivruski teaches you: Redstone Dust is a reagent that adds damage to Redstone, Ice, and Fire Bolts.
advancements.reagent.flying_reagent.desc: Tivruski shows you how to fly using Redstone Bolt and a Flying Reagent.    You learn to craft a Flying Reagent from a feather, some redstone dust, and a gold nugget.  until the flying reagent is consumed.
advancements.rmroot.description: A wise old Villager Tivruski, takes a liking to you and shares a bit of ancient secret magical lore about redstone dust.  New secrets revealed on the Redstone Magic Advancements Tab.  Press ESC and select the Advancements Button to see them.
